title: Honor
body:
So, 
My brother got lvl 3 honor and he got the loading screen flair and an msi capsule and when i got lvl 3 honor i didn't got neither of those
If you know why this happened please tell me

replies.body: Flair only lasts for one game, and it's required that you receive an honor in your previous match.  The capsules are random drops, but do start appearing upon reaching level 3.  Let me know if that clears things up!
